projects.title: Bell-212 Training Module
projects.description: A training website with interactive 3D models to learn about different components of the Bell-212 Helicopter. Also has options to take and set quiz.

projects.title: Aayatun
projects.description: A responsive, mobile-first Quran encyclopedia containing word-for-word meaning, word definition, two different recitations, and tafsir. It is hosted at https://onixhoque.pythonanywhere.com/.

projects.title: Plagiarism Checker
projects.description: A desktop application for plagiarism checking. It generates a detailed report, marks possible plagiarism cases based on statistics, and shows side-by-side similarity between two submissions.

projects.title: Social Media App
projects.description: A social media web app demonstrating Django features including ORM and authentication. It was converted into MicroKernel Architecture and the client-side rendering was implemented using VueJS.

projects.title: Automated Attendance Entry
projects.description: A desktop application that automatically extracts IDs from Google Meet chat scripts and submits attendance through a university portal using Selenium.

projects.title: Academic Calendar Generator for UIU
projects.description: A single-page application for generating academic calendars with live weekday count previews and export options to PDF/Excel. It handles single/multiple day holidays and makeup classes.

projects.title: CO/PO Attainment Tool for MIST
projects.description: An interactive Google Sheet for calculating CO/PO attainment scores from mark-sheets and CO/Assessment links. Generates reports on PO attainment, CO attainment, and assessment status.

projects.title: UG Course Distributor for MIST
projects.description: A desktop application to distribute courses for semester planning, showing live preview of total/distributed credits across faculty ranks. A budgeting system was added later.

projects.title: FixMyStreet for Brac
projects.description: An Android application enabling Dhaka city citizens to report urban road problems to the appropriate authorities. The project was completed under supervision of Brac IT.

projects.title: Bus Route Digitizer
projects.description: An Android app to view available bus routes in Dhaka including fare and ratings. Users can temporarily report route issues. The server backend was built using pure Java Sockets.

projects.title: Barcode Reader
projects.description: A desktop barcode reader that decodes 1D barcode images and identifies corresponding items. Uses Tesseract OCR Engine 3.02.

projects.title: Onix AV
projects.description: A GUI implementation of the ClamWin Virus Detection Engine. It supports downloading the latest signatures and removing infected files.
